Thomas N. ECKERLE, Appellant-Plaintiff,
v.
KATZ & KORIN, P.C., and Michael W. Hile, Appellees-Defendants Court of Appeals Case No. 49A02-1704-CT-735 Court of Appeals of Indiana. Filed November 14, 2017

CRONE , J.

MATHIAS, J., Concurs.
